entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF DRIZZLE IN THE EVENING
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING EAST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 50

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS AROUND 40
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
